程序包 org.elasticsearch.search.fetch.subphase.highlight

类 AnnotatedPassageFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.uhighlight.PassageFormatter
      • org.elasticsearch.search.fetch.subphase.highlight.AnnotatedPassageFormatter
  • public class AnnotatedPassageFormatter
extends PassageFormatter
    Custom passage formatter that : 1) marks up search hits in markdown-like syntax for URLs (Snippet) 2) injects any annotations from the original text that don't conflict with search hit highlighting
